response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact your business. Given its innovative features and high-quality standards, we estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering this, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a game-changing asset at a premium rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
